title: Seeing Art from the Inside of a Blue Skoda Octavia: A Day with Shimano Neutral Service at E3
content:
Shoddy goes inside the car with Shimano's neutral service team for a race viewing experience like no other.

Read the full article at Seeing Art from the Inside of a Blue Skoda Octavia: A Day with Shimano Neutral Service at E3 on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
